definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Holidays fried fruit, but also with butter.
sentences.chinese: 逢年过节炸果子，也用酥油。

sentences.english: They cut wood and hard fruits with stone axes.
sentences.chinese: 他们用石斧砍树和坚硬的果子。

sentences.english: That is, to bear the fruit the vine wishes to bring forth.
sentences.chinese: 这个目标就是要结出葡萄树想要结的果子来。

sentences.english: We'll toast to the New Year with a glass of bisho wine.
sentences.chinese: 让我们一起喝一杯加香料的果子酒，以贺新年。

sentences.english: This lesson says that Jesus is the "firstfruits" from the dead.
sentences.chinese: 这说明了耶稣就是从死里而来的初熟的果子。

sentences.english: Every tree that does not bear good fruit is cut down and thrown into the fire.
sentences.chinese: 凡不结好果子的树，就砍下来，丢在火里。

sentences.english: Our sterling silver strawberry charm captures the essence of this quintessentially summer fruit.
sentences.chinese: 我们由纯银制成的草莓吊饰，散发着夏曰果子的气息。

sentences.english: Have you eaten from the tree that I commanded you not to eat from?
sentences.chinese: 莫非你吃了我吩咐你不可吃的那树上的果子吗？

sentences.english: Sherbet lemons are hard candies filled with dry sherbet powder.
sentences.chinese: 柠檬果子露其实就是中心填了这种干果子露粉的硬糖。

sentences.english: Sherbet lemons are hard candies filled with dry sherbet powder.
sentences.chinese: 柠檬果子露其实就是中心填了这种干果子露粉的硬糖。

sentences.english: According to the archives, our Chinese ancestors began using stilts to help them gather fruits from trees.
sentences.chinese: 根据记载，我们的祖先踩高跷是为了从树上摘果子。
我们吃着绿色的吉露果子冻。

sentences.english: Fruit ripens not well in the shade.
sentences.chinese: 阴凉处的果子不会成熟。

sentences.english: In the fourth year all its fruit will be holy, an offering of praise to the Lord .
sentences.chinese: 但第四年所结的果子全要成为圣，用以赞美耶和华。

sentences.english: Truth is a fruit which should not be plucked until it is ripe.
sentences.chinese: 真理是一种必须在成熟后才可采摘的果子。

sentences.english: Sherbet is made with fruits and ice.
sentences.chinese: 冰冻果子露是用水果和冰做的。

definition: fruit (produced by a plant)/(fig.) fruits (of success etc)/results/gains
